pkgmetadata.longdescription: # cinquis-utilcinquis utilities repo## Patch History### 0.0.1 untested build### 0.0.2cleand up code with pylint### 0.0.3renamed cinquis-util to cinquis_util due to package name requirements### 0.0.4renamed src/cinquis-util to src/cinquis_util and updated build files### 0.0.5updated text_analytics.py to import spacy### 0.0.6updated to use spacy current, removed some old spacy imports for cli
